sentences.en: And in fact it is just shown in percentages, less than a quarter of the painting itself deals with Hannibal and his army, and the rest is this swollen angry sky with the sun just flickering through.
sentences.cn: 事实上这从画面的比例中就显示出来，整个画面中只有不到四分之一的画幅是描绘汉尼拔和他的军队的，而其余的空间都给了昏暗的天空、躁动的云以及闪烁不定的阳光。

sentences.en: Anthony Hopkins , now you had to replace Jodi Foster in Hannibal right?
sentences.cn: 安东尼·普金斯, 你取代朱迪·福斯特出演了《沉默的羔羊-续集》,是 吗 ?

sentences.en: By the side of the general is his little son Hannibal, now nine years of age.
sentences.cn: 元帅旁边是他的小儿子汉尼拔, 当时年方九岁.

sentences.en: Fixed typo in Hannibal civilopedia entry.
sentences.cn: 修正了汉拔尼百科条目的排版.

sentences.en: Hannibal Lecter: A census taker once tried to test me.
sentences.cn: 汉尼拔: 曾经有人想调查我.

sentences.en: Hannibal Lecter: And what did you see, Clarice? What did you see?
sentences.cn: 汉尼拔: 你看到了什么?

sentences.en: Hannibal Lecter: But you could and you did, didn't you ?
sentences.cn: 汉尼拔: 但是你可以, 不是 吗 ?

sentences.en: Hannibal Lecter: Enthrall me with your acumen.
sentences.cn: 汉尼拔: 施展一下你聪慧的魅力.

sentences.en: Hannibal Lecter: Spoken like a true Protestant.
sentences.cn: 汉尼拔: 说得像个真实的新教徒.

sentences.en: Hannibal Lecter: Then how did you catch me?
sentences.cn: 汉尼拔: 那你是怎么捉住我的?

sentences.en: Hannibal Lecter: They were slaughtering the spring lambs?
sentences.cn: 汉尼拔: 他们在屠宰春羔?

sentences.en: Hannibal Lecter: What became of your lamb, Clarice?
sentences.cn: 汉尼拔: 那你的羊羔呢, 克拉丽斯?

sentences.en: Hannibal Lecter: Where were you going, Clarice?
sentences.cn: 汉尼拔: 克拉丽斯, 你要去哪?

sentences.en: Hannibal Lecter: Why do you think he removes their skins, Agent Starling?
sentences.cn: 汉尼拔: 你为什么认为他给他们剥了皮, 斯塔琳特工?

sentences.en: Hannibal was now crossing the Alps.
sentences.cn: 汉尼拔那时正在翻越阿尔卑斯山.

sentences.en: Lady Murasaki helps Hannibal to heal.
sentences.cn: 穆拉莎奇帮助汉尼拔恢复了健康.

trans.tran_cn: 汉尼拔（前247-前183，迦太基统帅）
